string-array.name: list_sectiongroups
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all SectionGroups
Queries for all sectionGroups under all notebooks in OneNote and returns a list. SectionGroups are not very common, so you may see 0 results

string-array.name: list_sectiongroups_in_a_notebook
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all SectionGroups in a notebook
Queries for all sectionGroups under a notebook in OneNote and returns a list. SectionGroups are not very common, so you may see 0 results

string-array.name: create_sectiongroup_in_notebook
string-array.item: POST: Create a section group in a notebook

First we get a list of all notebooks and then create an empty section group in the selected notebook. Please select a notebook from the drop-down above and enter the new section group\'s name in the text box.

string-array.name: create_sectiongroup_in_sectiongroup
string-array.item: POST: Create a section group in a section group

First we get a list of all section groups and then create an empty section group in the selected section group. Please select a section group from the drop-down above and enter the new section group\'s name in the text box.
